trolley.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a large basket on wheels that you use for carrying bags, shopping etc
trolley.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a small table on wheels used for serving food
trolley.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: the sweet trolley  (=one for serving sweet dishes, cakes etc in a restaurant)
trolley.translation[0].definitions[2].de: an electric vehicle for carrying passengers which moves along the street on metal tracks
